## Experimental.Formattable.format() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Formats an object using the supplied mustache template.

**Signature:**

```typescript
format(format: string): Result<string>;
```

Type

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

format


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

A mustache template used to format the object.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;string&gt;

`Success<string>` with the resulting string, or `Failure<string>` with an error message if an error occurs.
